unnormalised: Arre yaar, why is it so difficult to remember all these numbers? I mean, my bank account number is like, 1234567890123, and then there's the IFSC code SBIN0001234. Don't even get me started on the PAN, ABCDE1234F! And now they're asking for my UPI ID too, like priya.sharma@upi. Is there no end to this? I wish there was just one number to remember everything!
normalised: arre yaar, why is it so difficult to remember all these numbers? I mean, my bank account number is like, one two three four five six seven eight nine zero one two three, and then there's the I-F-S-C code S-B-I-N zero zero zero one two three four. Don't even get me started on the P-A-N, A-B-C-D-E one two three four F! And now they're asking for my U-P-I I-D too, like priya.sharma at u-p-i. Is there no end to this? I wish there was just one number to remember everything!
